text: namut (nabiye!) obage deviyan itamat ksama karanneku ha dayabaravantayeku vasayenda sitinneya. ovun karana (napuru) vipathi hetuven ohu (evele evelema) ovunva alla gatahot, metek ovunva anivaryayenma danduvam kara æta. ehet (ovunta danduvam kirimata) ovunta ek niyamita kalayak æta. in pasuva ovunta berimata margayak dakinne næta
